author: jm
msg: bug 3150: removed PORN_4 and split up into the worthwhile sub-rule parts; dropped the 'teen' rule and a few long-dead spammer domains

author: jm
msg: bug 2713: removed code from Dustin Sallings, since we never got a CLA on-paper and it's holding up ASF migration.  This means the --virtual-config switch is now gone; but --virtual-config-dir is still present, so users can migrate to that
